name: Spacycrafts
description:
Defend your generator against waves of enemies with your teammate. At the end, you have to fight your teammate to death because only one of you can survive. 

Dramatic intro aside, this is a fast paced shooter game made for a game jam organized by WPI in a week. This game was made with a javascript framework called p5.js. It's highly recommended to watch the short tutorial before playing. If it's your first time playing, it might take the game a while to load up so please be patient.

I had to use the music from my last game as i ran out of time and couldn't make another ;-;

Also, here is the source code if somehow you can read it https://editor.p5js.org/kaganatalay/sketches/5ba9fY1aP
